about_the_game:
Frisson DT is a single-player, psychological horror game. (Multiplayer functionality will be added soon!) You play a real-life paranormal investigator / live-streamer.  You (and your colleagues) will visit various spooky locations to investigate reports of paranormal activity and figure out whether the reports are legitimate or a hoax. Once that's out of the way, you can identify the cause of the paranormal activity and help to remove it, all whilst trying to keep your viewers engaged and grow your online presence. Oh, and try not to die!

  • Research new technologies to help locate, identify, pacify and remove Paranormal entities.

  • Collect cards and grow your collection.

  • Lean new ways to protect yourself from the imminent danger that comes from meddling with the supernatural.

  • Buy new equipment to help improve the quality of your live streams and make them more engaging.

  • Upgrade your player HQ by adding new furniture, or upgrading existing stuff.

  • Soil yourself with the most intense horror experience

  • Witness paranormal events to make your stream more exciting for viewers

  • Grow your online presence to make more money and beat the competition.
detailed_description:
Frisson DT is a single-player, psychological horror game. (Multiplayer functionality will be added soon!) You play a real-life paranormal investigator / live-streamer.  You (and your colleagues) will visit various spooky locations to investigate reports of paranormal activity and figure out whether the reports are legitimate or a hoax. Once that's out of the way, you can identify the cause of the paranormal activity and help to remove it, all whilst trying to keep your viewers engaged and grow your online presence. Oh, and try not to die!

  • Research new technologies to help locate, identify, pacify and remove Paranormal entities.

  • Collect cards and grow your collection.

  • Lean new ways to protect yourself from the imminent danger that comes from meddling with the supernatural.

  • Buy new equipment to help improve the quality of your live streams and make them more engaging.

name: Frisson DT

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Inter i5-3570 3.4 Ghz 4 Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 / AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection required for Multiplayer
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 5600X﻿ or ﻿i5-12400 ﻿or equivalent performance, 6 physical cores minimum
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070﻿ or RX 5700, or equivalent performance & VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Internet Connection required for Multiplayer

short_description: Frisson DT is a single-player psychological horror game (with multiplayer coming soon!). Play as a paranormal investigator and live-streamer exploring spooky locations to uncover and resolve paranormal activity. Engage your audience, grow your channel, and survive the terror!
